class_description:
Thrown when an application attempts to use null in a
 case where an object is required. These include: Applications should throw instances of this class to indicate
 other illegal uses of the null object.

 NullPointerException objects may be constructed by the
 virtual machine as if Throwable#Throwable(String,
 Throwable, boolean, boolean).

Methods.method_description: Constructs a NullPointerException with no detail message.

Constructs a NullPointerException with the specified
 detail message.
